text: - So every organization who wants

to stay relevant has a digital
transformation in place.

Either they're already
running fully in the cloud
or they're starting this first project,
but you need to disrupt,

and this is why we are
also partnering with AWS,
because they started that disruption.
(upbeat music)
- Nexthink was born 18 years ago,
so at the time we we're talking about
on-premise software, right?

And our first step in
the journey was to move
to cloud solution,

and now to a cloud-native
solution with AWS.
So this has been instrumental
in order to be able to speed up innovation

and to be able to target new
markets much more quickly.
- Right now with the wave of
sort of generative AI that's coming,
that's just opening up quite a lot
of potential for us in terms of problems
that were really hard to solve
before in our space where there's just
so much opportunity right now.
- [Roland] AWS, our partner,
gives us a very good feeling in security.

- I believe that being hosted
in AWS allows any company

to just be able to focus
on the core business

and give the responsibility
of the infrastructure
to experts, which are AWS Cloud.
- AWS is instrumental for our growth.

We started in Switzerland,
then we grew in Europe,
and then all around the world.
